price: Enti (saa nnipa yi) mmfa (Nyankopͻn) Asεm no nnkͻ adwendwen mu, anaasε biribi aba wͻn hͻ a ebi amma wͻ wͻn agyanom tetefoͻ no hͻ?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
